cves.description: Reflected Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in versions prior to 4.7.0 of Quiter Gateway by Quiter. This vulnerability allows an attacker to execute JavaScript code in the victim's browser by sending a malicious URL trhough the id_factura parameter in /<Client>FacturaE/listado_facturas_ficha.jsp.

affected.product: Quiter Gateway (Java WAR on Apache Tomcat)

problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')

cves.description: Improper error handling vulnerability in versions prior to 4.7.0 of Quiter Gateway by Quiter. This vulnerability allows an attacker to send malformed payloads to generate error messages containing sensitive information.

affected.product: Quiter Gateway (Java WAR on Apache Tomcat)

problemType: CWE-209 Generation of Error Message Containing Sensitive Information

cves.description: SQL injection vulnerability in versions prior to 4.7.0 of Quiter Gateway by Quiter. This vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve, create, update and delete databases through the pagina.filter.categoria mensaje in /QuiterGatewayWeb/api/v1/sucesospagina.

affected.product: Quiter Gateway (Java WAR on Apache Tomcat)

problemType: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')

cves.description: SQL injection vulnerability in versions prior to 4.7.0 of Quiter Gateway by Quiter. This vulnerability allows an attacker to retrieve, create, update and delete databases through the suceso.contenido mensaje in /QMSCliente/Sucesos.action.

affected.product: Quiter Gateway (Java WAR on Apache Tomcat)

problemType: CWE-89 Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
